QuestData.Title: Actions Speak Louder than Words
QuestData.Description:
<The ash ghoul inspects you, checking your weapons and armor closely.
He shifts his eyes from you to your kyrian companions before checking back in with Theotar, who nods to him.
Alwin motions for you to follow him.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Mindscorched Alwin through the Ashen Traverse.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Mindscorched Alwin in the Charred Ramparts.
